title: Development of Customized Strategies to Strengthen Resilience During Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in advanced mathematical concepts and professional field experience
context.additional_context: Focus on developing personalized strategies for managing frustration and building resilience among professional learners in medical/legal/technical fields during mathematics learning

learning_goals: Learners can apply positive emotional intervention strategies in frustrating situations with 80% accuracy.
Learners overcome mathematical task obstacles more than three times using creative problem-solving techniques.
Learners maintain a self-reflection journal to strengthen learning identity, recording entries at least twice weekly.

Learners engage in a peer feedback system (online forums, group discussions, etc.) to exchange feedback on math problem-solving processes twice weekly for four weeks, build a sustained interaction network with at least three peers, and achieve a satisfaction score of 4 or higher (on a 5-point scale) in the post-course feedback survey.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
